description: Machine-readable timeline of major decisions, incidents, and constitutional moments

timeline.subject: OpenRouter API Key Exposure Detected
timeline.description: IF.YoloGuard v3.0 detected exposure of primary OpenRouter API key through GitHub repositories
timeline.outcome: API key marked for revocation; security audit initiated

timeline.subject: Security Incident Response & Key Revocation Activated
timeline.description: Formal security incident response following OpenRouter API key exposure; IF.Guard activated for threat assessment

timeline.subject: Session Handover System Deployed (3-Tier Architecture)
timeline.description: Deployment of comprehensive session handover system preventing context exhaustion through 3-tier architecture

architecture.tier_1: Current mission, git state, blockers, immediate next action
architecture.tier_2: 91 IF.* component catalog with MD5 hashes
architecture.tier_3: Research papers (6,078 lines), evidence (102+ docs), historical records

timeline.outcome: Session coherence guaranteed across context boundaries; IF.TTT framework operational
timeline.git_message: Add session handover system with IF.TTT traceability framework

timeline.subject: Series 2 Genesis - Archaeology Recovery of Librarian/YoloGuard
timeline.description: Archaeological recovery operation of Librarian/YoloGuard foundational documentation and component genealogy
recovery_scope: YoloGuard evolution to strategic communications council
Dossier 07: 100% consensus on civilizational collapse patterns
Document consolidation framework (82.87% approval, pending execution)
key_discoveries: IF.sam: 16 multifaceted dimensions of Sam Altman's ethical spectrum
IF.Guard: 20-voice extended council with stress-testing capability
Document consolidation: 82.87% approval, deferred pending user authorization
timeline.outcome: Complete genealogy mapped; Series 2 foundational knowledge base established

timeline.subject: Constitutional Convention - Genesis Structure Ratified (5-0 Unanimous)
timeline.description: Constitutional Convention formally ratifying Genesis Structure of InfraFabric with unanimous 5-0 Guardian Council vote
governance_protocols: Council Decision Framework: 100% consensus requires empirical validation + testable predictions + mathematical isomorphism
Contrarian Guardian can veto >95% approval with 2-week cooling-off period
Preserve git history and dissent when consolidating documents

token_efficiency_strategy.haiku_delegation: Mechanical tasks (file updates, installations, data transformations, git operations)
token_efficiency_strategy.sonnet_usage: Complex reasoning, architecture decisions, council deliberations
token_efficiency_strategy.parallelization: Multiple Haiku agents for independent tasks
token_efficiency_strategy.cost_optimization: Haiku is 10x cheaper than Sonnet - use aggressively

project_architecture: NaviDocs: Boat documentation platform (MVP 65% complete, 5 cloud sessions ready)
timeline.outcome: InfraFabric constitutional framework formalized and ratified; project ready for Series 2 expansion

queries.example_pending_actions: Filter by status=PENDING or in pending_user_actions
queries.example_dependencies: Follow dependencies field to trace decision genealogy
